Package domain

Class LongWall

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Wall
      • domain.LongWall
  • public class LongWall
extends Wall
    This wall's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal wall, except it has a length of 3 squares.
    Since:
    25-05-2023
